name: Shutin
description:
Survival horror meets life simulator. Then again, what’s the difference between the two? How long will you last, seeing to your needs, working to pay your food and bills, until it all comes crashing down?

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41 by Ava Skoog. Some sound effects from zapsplat.com. The theme was to combine two "incompatible" genres, in my case survival horror and life simulator. Turns out they're basically the same thing, however…

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/shutin

WASD or arrows plus mouse.
